Decks Screen
On this screen you can add, review, remove and edit card decks. By clicking on the respective card deck you can review all the cards in the respecitve deck. When clicking on the edit button of the card deck you can edit the name of the deck or delete the deck. You can create a new deck by clicking the add deck button in the lower right corner of the decks screen. After doing so you can enter the name of your new deck and create a new deck or cancel the operation.
Edit cards
To edit cards, you have to access the respective deck where a card is stored in. After doing so simply click the card. You can now edit the answer, the question or delete the card. The operation is stored when clicking accept.
Add new cards
To add a new card enter the respective deck in which you want to add the new card. After doing so click the add card button in the lower right corner. Then enter the question and the respective answer for a card.
Review deck
To review the cards of a specific deck select the respective deck. Then tap the start review button located in the lower left corner.
To review random cards, simply enter the random cards section from the navigation menu. In this section all cards will be reviewed where the next repetition date is in the past. You can also review cards of a specific deck, as described above. When reviewing cards the question is first shown on the screen. Then you have to remember it and tap the screen to see the correct answer. After the answer is shown, you have to select how hard it was to remember the correct answer. If it was easy click the easy button. If you were not 100% sure click the doubt button. And if it was wrong click the difficult button. After clicking one of these buttons the next card will be displayed.
Review cards Statistics
In the statistics screen you can find General Statistics, User Statistics and Forecasts about your performance and your cards. In the General Statistics section there is listed the amount of cards and decks stored in the flashcards app. In the User Statistics section there is data about your performance available, i.e. how many good, doubt and difficult cards there in all of your decks. In the Forecast section you can see how many cards you still have to review this week and the upcoming weeks.
